byline.original: By G.H. ARCHAMBAULT Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Allies charting of German defenses described; Brit release RAF Westwall pictures; machine gun units active in Rhine sector; Germans rept artillery activity
snippet: WITH THE FRENCH ARMIES in the Field, Feb. 2--A war of movement may be an art, but a war of position is very definitely a science. Visits to various sections at the headquarters of more than one army make this point very clear......

headline.main: WAR OF POSITION A PRECISE SCIENCE; Camera a Powerful Weapon of the French in Charting Details of Foe's Defenses MATHEMATICS IMPORTANT Battery Officers Direct Fire at the Positions Located by Abscissas and Ordinates

lead_paragraph: WITH THE FRENCH ARMIES in the Field, Feb. 2--A war of movement may be an art, but a war of position is very definitely a science. Visits to various sections at the headquarters of more than one army make this point very clear...
